roles.name: Cost Administrator Local Test
roles.description: A cost management administrator role that grants read and write permissions, just for testing locally.

roles.name: Cost Price List Administrator Local Test
roles.description: A cost management role that grants read and write permissions on price list rates, just for testing locally.

roles.name: Cost Cloud Viewer Local Test
roles.description: A cost management role that grants read permissions on cost reports related to cloud sources, just for testing locally.

roles.name: Cost OpenShift Viewer Local Test
roles.description: A cost management role that grants read permissions on cost reports related to OpenShift sources, just for testing locally.
